fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the Factional Kill.
- Attack everyone who visits you. (Costs 4 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, all Causes of Death are hidden publicly. The player will still know how they died, and roles that pick up notifications will see that.
- Killing visitors will destroy last wills as well.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were slain by a Gallic Gaesetae.” (Factional Kill, if attribute is neutralized)
“They were ambushed by the Gallic army.” (Killing Visitors, if attribute is neutralized)
“We could not determine how they died.” (Obfuscated Death)
